title: Could virtual reality technology actually help people in their daily lives? If so, how? - Quora

response.answer_text: In many ways some more sublime than others. Imagine wearing sports glasses that show the sweet spot to shoot a basketball, or pool, or baseball analyzing a pitch real time. Night vision with IR, UV, or SONAR overlaid on field of view. Or glasses that guide you to products in a store, or highlight sale items, or things you are out of at home or have coupons. Or face recognition when you see somebody who’s name you forgot. Those are but a few things.
